briefdescription.para: Performs clustering merge for a given partition.

detaileddescription.para: Performs clustering merge on a given partition.
Iteratively merges clusters if combined variance decreases.
Variance is calculated over all edge weights within the cluster.

briefdescription.para: Computes the total cut for current partitions.

detaileddescription.para: Computes total cut size for current partition.
Cut is defined as the sum of all edge weights from nodes in partition 0 to nodes in partition 1.
D(V) = external_connections - internal_connections
External connections are edges from this cluster to all clusters in the opposite partition. Internal connections are edges from this cluster to other clusters in the same partition.

simplesect.para: Difference between external and internal connections

briefdescription.para: Initializes the partitions from a CSV adjacency matrix file.

detaileddescription.para: Initializes partitions from an adjacency matrix file.

Reads a CSV file where each row corresponds to a node and contains edge weights to all other nodes. Diagonal elements represent the node itself and are ignored. Initializes a simple even-odd partition: nodes 0,2,4,... go to partition 0, others to partition 1.

parameterdescription.para: Path to the CSV file containing adjacency matrix

memberdef.argsstring: (const vector< int > &A, const vector< int > &B) noexcept
memberdef.name: kl_gain

briefdescription.para: Computes the KL gain of swapping two clusters.

detaileddescription.para: Computes KL gain for swapping two clusters.
Gain = D(A) + D(B) - 2 * edge_sum_between_A_B

A
Cluster from partition 0
B
Cluster from partition 1
KL gain value
Performs one Kernighan–Lin pass
Swaps cluster pairs between partitions to maximize gain. Records the cut evolution in global cut_trace.

Algorithm:
For each unlocked cluster in partition 0, compute gain with each unlocked cluster in partition 1.
Select the pair with maximum gain and swap them.
Lock the swapped clusters.
Repeat until all clusters are locked or no positive gain.
Rollback swaps after best prefix sum of gains.

briefdescription.para: Performs one pass of the Kernighan–Lin algorithm.

detaileddescription.para: Selects cluster pairs to swap to maximize gain. Records cut evolution in cut_trace.

briefdescription.para: Writes final cut evolution and cluster variances to a file.

detaileddescription.para: Writes final cut and cluster variances to a file.
Also writes all cut values stored in cut_trace.

briefdescription.para: Writes node-to-partition mapping to a file.

detaileddescription.para: Format: node_index partition_index

briefdescription.para: Writes cut evolution per iteration to CSV.

detaileddescription.para: Writes cut evolution per iteration to a CSV file.
Format: step,cut_value
